heading.1: UI framework for React and CSS

hero.subheading: Camome UI enables you to build various styles of components without run-time JavaScript by fully utilizing the power of CSS.

themable.title: Fully themable
themable.description: By combining a well-constructed design system and CSS variables, you can freely customize the theme.

no-runtime.title: Just CSS, no runtime JavaScript
no-runtime.description: Built on top of CSS Modules, Camome UI is free from runtime overhead unlike with CSS-in-JS.

design.title: Simple but elegant design
design.description: All the components are designed to blend in with basic design websites, but also can be aggressively customized.

styling.heading: Nothing fancy, it just works.
styling.subheading: Camome UI is not a fancy framework that advocates for new styling methods. You know how to use it.

theming.heading: Fully themable.
theming.subheading: It provides sensible defaults, but may not be to everyone's taste. Customize the theme to suit your site.

subheading.1: Don't worry about order or specificity when overriding.

cta.heading: Start your next project from here.
cta.subheading: Develop faster with a well-constructed design system and components.
